"'Today'" was the first and only single from Melanie B's second solo album,
[[L.A. State of Mind]]. It was released on June 13, 2005. It entered and peaked
at #41, charting for only one
week, http://www.chartstats.com/artistinfo.php?id=10669 making it the
lowest selling single of a Spice Girls member. The music video was directed by
Mark McConnell in Los Angeles.
